content: Petros Dellaportas has a joint appointment as a professor in Statistical Science in the department of Statistical Science, University College London and as a professor of Statistics in the department of Statistics, Athens University of Economics and Business. He is also a Turing fellow of the Alan Turing Institute, the United Kingdom’s national institute for data science and artificial intelligence.

title: Petros Dellaportas
